courses.title: DesignBuilder Modeller
courses.description: Forms a module with the second day. This first day is the introduction to the DesignBuilder interface, with a focus on model geometry information input and drawing models. The two-day module offers SACAP CPD (2 points) and ECSA CPD (2 points).

courses.title: DesignBuilder Simulation
courses.description: Forms a module with the first day.  This second day focuses on running simulations and extracting data from DesignBuilder. The two-day module offers SACAP CPD (2 points) and ECSA CPD (2 points).

courses.title: Using DesignBuilder for SANS 10400 XA
courses.description: This module demonstrates how DesignBuilder is used to determine whether a house complies with the SANS 10400-XA standard by following the building energy modelling route. SACAP CPD (1 point), ECSA CPD (1 point).

courses.title: DesignBuilder HVAC
courses.description: This module demonstrates how DesignBuilder is used to model modern HVAC systems at the component detail level. ECSA CPD (1 point).

courses.title: DesignBuilder Advanced Modules
courses.description: This day is spent looking at other powerful modules and calculation functionality within the software. The module is structured such that the three most popular topics will be covered: (1) CFD (2) Natural Ventilation and (3) Thermal Comfort.
